thread.title: BRIEF-Energy Capital Partners III Reports 9.9 Pct Stake In Dynegy As Of Jan. 9 Compared To Stake Of 14.9 Percent As Of April 27 - Sec Filing

title: BRIEF-Energy Capital Partners III Reports 9.9 Pct Stake In Dynegy As Of Jan. 9 Compared To Stake Of 14.9 Percent As Of April 27 - Sec Filing
text:
#Funds News  47 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Energy Capital Partners III Reports 9.9 Pct Stake In Dynegy As Of Jan. 9 Compared To Stake Of 14.9 Percent As Of April 27 - Sec Filing Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Energy Capital Partners III LLC: 
* ENERGY CAPITAL PARTNERS III LLC REPORTS 9.9 PERCENT STAKE IN DYNEGY INC AS OF JANUARY 9 COMPARED TO A STAKE OF 14.9 PERCENT AS OF APRIL 27 - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2mkXFAK ) Further company coverage:
